definition: to exceed/to overtake/to surpass/to transcend/to pass/to cross/ultra-/super-
Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]

sentences.english: Application is ultrashort also have better curative effect.
sentences.chinese: 應用超短波也有較好療效。

sentences.english: Based on ultra-short wave communication, author discusses the channel equalizer.
sentences.chinese: 針對超短波跳頻系統，討論信道均衡技術。

sentences.english: A novel VHF broadband twin-whip antenna is introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種新型的超短波寬帶雙鞭天線。

sentences.english: A new printed UHF antenna with omnidirectional radiation and broad band is discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論了一種新型全向寬頻帶超短波印刷天線。

sentences.english: Results The synthetical treatment by ultrashort wave is better significantly then the controlled group.
sentences.chinese: 結果超短波綜合組優於對照組。

sentences.english: And the effects of USW to the optic injury of rats.
sentences.chinese: 探討超短波對視神經鉗夾傷大鼠神經再生的影響。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate clinical effects of ultrashort wave on chronic prostatitis patients.
sentences.chinese: 目的評價超短波治療慢性前列腺炎的效果。

sentences.english: Conclusion The combined treatment of the ultrashort waves physiotherapy and Penyan soup was effective.
sentences.chinese: 結論超短波聯合盆炎方治療慢性盆腔炎療效顯著。

sentences.english: Both are treated with the vacuum suction stereo-dynamic interferential electrotherapy and ultrashort wave therapy.
sentences.chinese: 均採用真空抽吸立體動態干擾電與超短波治療。

definition: wax therapy (used to treat arthritis etc)
diathermia (medical treatment involving local heating of body tissues with electric current)
